infobox_data.Notes: Can be infiltrated to unlockstolen tech units

article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Utility PowerCost: $1500Recharge Time: 8:00All Tier 1 Soviet units, War Miners, Demolition Trucks/Bomb Buggies, and Mosquito Demoboats are trained/produced as elite for 90 secondsLeft-click to activate
Type: Reinforcement PowerCost: $2000Recharge Time: 5:30Deploys 3 Mortar Quads to the battlefieldLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)

Type: Defensive PowerCost: $500Recharge Time: 4:30Deploys a Flame Tower on the battlefieldCreates a small fire explosion upon deployment Strong vs. InfantryLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)

Type: Utility PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 6:30Call in smoke bombing runs from a Sandstorm bomberSmoke bombs weaken the firepower of enemy units by 50%, but cannot directly harm themLeft-click icon then left-click on target location
